metadata.title: CVE-2019-20429 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In the Lustre file system before 2.12.3, the ptlrpc module has an out-of-bounds read and panic (via a modified lm_bufcount field) due to the lack of validation for specific fields of packets sent by a client. This is caused by interaction between sptlrpc_svc_unwrap_request and lustre_msg_hdr_size_v2.

notes.note: sbeattie> lustre was removed from the upstream staging tree in 4.18 (be65f9ed267fd7d8b3146b7c4be9ecdd3e0aa3ed)
